entity.name: Thomas Poignant
entity.description: I am the owner and maintainer of GO Feature Flag, a simple, complete and lightweight self-hosted feature flag solution 100% Open Source.

projects.name: GO Feature Flag
projects.description: GO Feature Flag is a simple, complete and lightweight self-hosted feature flag solution 100% Open Source.

channels.description: Support me on GitHub Sponsors for ongoing development.
If you prefer a wire transfer, please contact GO Feature Flag directly.

plans.name: One time Support Plan
plans.description: Support the ongoing development of GO Feature Flag by making a one-time donation.

plans.name: Monthly Support Plan
plans.description: Help GO Feature Flag to be sustainable and make donation every months.

plans.name: Premium Support Plan
plans.description: Help us shape the future of GO Feature Flag with your ideas by making a donation every month. A maintainer can join your slack/teams organisation and be available to answer your questions directly there.
